thread.title: Michaels: 60% Off Craft Storage Sale = 10 Drawer Rolling Cart Only $29.99 (Reg. $89) + More
thread.title_full: Michaels: 60% Off Craft Storage Sale = 10 Drawer Rolling Cart Only $29.99 (Reg. $89) + More

author: mpricehip2save
title: Michaels: 60% Off Craft Storage Sale = 10 Drawer Rolling Cart Only $29.99 (Reg. $89) + More
text:
Time to get organized! Through March 25th, head to your local Michaels or Michaels.com where you’ll find Craft Storage items on sale for 60% off the original ticketed price! And this sale is not just for all you crafty Hip2Savers as these storage items are also great for playrooms, home work areas, home offices and even the garage.
if you opt to shop online at Michaels.com , shipping is free on orders over $49 through March 25th – no promo code needed OR you can have your order shipped to the store for $4.95; otherwise shipping is $6.95-$7.95.
As an example, we spotted this Recollections 10 Drawer Rolling Organizer cart for just $29.99 (regularly $89.99) available in solid white or rainbow colored! These carts are nice for organizing coupons as well !
More hot storage deals we spotted… 
Photo Storage Boxes including Disney Princess styles (regularly $4.99) – In-Store Only 
ONLY $1.66!

Recollections 3-Tier Rolling Cart (regularly $59.99) – Available in white, silver or mint 
ONLY $23.99!

Large Photo and Craft Keeper (regularly $39.99) – great for LEGOs too! 
ONLY $15.99

Recollections 5 Drawer Letterpress Cube (regularly $89.99) 
ONLY $35.99

Artist’s Loft Arts & Crafts Creative Center (regularly $199.99) 
ONLY $89.99

Also score Creatology Kids’ Color-in Playhouses for ONLY $10 at Michaels stores (regularly $29.99)!
